scam.title: Possible scam attempt
scam.description: You scanned a QR code which is not by TempQR. Please be cautious as this might be a scam attempt. Someone might have been notified about this error.

success.title: Success
success.description: You scanned a valid QR code. The QR has been marked as used on our database.

alreadyValidated.title: Already Validated
alreadyValidated.description: You scanned an already scanned QR code. This might be positive or negative according to your implementation of TempQR.

error.title: Error
error.description: You scanned an invalid QR code. The content is plausible, but the database does not contain it. Someone might have been notified about this error.

otherOrganization.title: QR code not in your organization
otherOrganization.description: You scanned a valid QR code, but it's not in your organization. Try again with another TempQR account. The QR code has not been marked as used. Someone might have been notified about this error.
